title: Two T206 HOFers For Sale - Bresnahan & Beckley - SOLD
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: Two T206 HOFers For Sale - Bresnahan & Beckley - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are two raw T206 HOFers, Roger Bresnahan and Jake Beckley.  Bresnahan is a great looking card but has a pin hole at the top.  Beckley also has nice eye appeal, with a light wrinkle at the top of his head. 

Please add $2.50 shipping for each. Paypal Goods preferred.

Jake Beckley - $55.00 

[URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/IMG_0001_zpswhmol48x.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMG_0001_zpswhmol48x.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/IMG_0003_zpsozt3pslx.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMG_0003_zpsozt3pslx.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Roger Bresnahan - $50.00 

[URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/IMG_0002_zpstxbwghsy.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMG_0002_zpstxbwghsy.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/IMG_0004_zpskozz3cf0.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/IMG_0004_zpskozz3cf0.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
PM sent on both cards, thanks
